content.content: Hello! Just wanted to introduce myself to this here community.  I have been fascinated with uniswap for a while and love the idea of having a governance token for a decentralized exchange! I’ve been interested in crypto for about a decade buying my first bitcoin for $5! I love crypto and it never ceases to amaze me,  I think its so important for our future. I plan on being active here and using my votes whenever possible!   Look forward to chatting with you all. -Tim

Thank you for the introduction Timothy  I’m locking this topic as it’s not really the right place for welcome discussions. However, happy to have you on board. There’s a great Discord channel in which you can chat with community members, there’s also a dedicated Governance discussion there: https://discord.gg/TUf9HS Have a great day!
